column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=George Plimpton .
#Text=He was a rather famous sports journalist who was known for ' walking a mile in an athlete 's shoes . '
#Text=For instance , he spent a spring training practicing with the Detroit Lions and even played quarterback for several downs during an exhibition game .
#Text=He then went on to write the book : Paper Lion from the experience .
#Text=And that 's how I 've been , to a degree , as a presidential candidate .
#Text=That is , I try to live the platform I espouse .

#Text=For instance , as part of our urban platform , we exhort some people in suburban and small town America to roll up their sleeves and move into the urban cores of LA , Chicago , Minneapolis ... to work on systemically changing things .
#Text=( Just throwing more money and police presence at the problem is like metaphorically putting a band aid on something that needs major surgery . )

#Text=Taking our own advice – in a very ' Plimpton-like ' manner – our family moved from Bluffton ( pop . 3,857 and think Mayberry ) to a hardscrabble part of Cleveland ( the poorest big city in the country ) .
#Text=We moved into a block where a group of Catholic Workers were living every 3rd or 4th house down from each other .

#Text=There we all helped transform an old asphalt parking lot into an urban farm , volunteered at a drop-in center for the marginalized up the street ; coached Rec . Center soccer and baseball teams ( many of the kids not having dads at home ) and ... Besides participating in the transformation of this area , like George Plimpton again , I wrote a book about the experience titled America 's Best Urban Neighborhood ...
#Text=We also , as another example , promote an agricultural platform that would push for the return of the small family farm , en mass .
#Text=And as we traveled the country , not only did we research the various dynamics of the family farm , but our family worked on a number of them as well .
#Text=This included chores like chopping wood , bailing hay , weeding by hoe in an organic bean field … And these were not 20-minute photo-ops , so to speak .
#Text=These were long , sweaty days out on the farm .

#Text=The essence of my candidacy has been ‘ being on the ground ’ and working side-by-side with ordinary folks , listening to their thoughts , translating them into positions … Ours , truly , is an ‘ American peoples ’ platform . ’
#Text=Note : While not a bona-fide historical figure ( more fiction , but you wish he was real ) , I also identify with : Rocky .
#Text=“ Some may feel it ’s another Rocky Balboa story about an Ohio man against the millionaires . ” -- Alban Mehling , Associated Content
#Text=Could you take this test , and let us know where you stand on the political spectrum ?
#Text=Schriner 's results for the World 's Smallest Political Quiz
#Text=On the test , I scored as a “ centrist . ”
#Text=( Surprised me too . )
